page.title: 05LANDSCAPE CHANGES/OWERMOIGNE
page.content: THE SOMEWHAT{LIMITED NATURAL RESOURCES OF THE AREA HAVE BEEN WELL EXPLOITED. {PROXIMITY TO WEYMOUTH AND DORCHESTER } AND AN ALL YEAR CARAVAN SITE CATER FOR {TOURISM}.GOOD SOIL GIVES RISE TO A TOTAL OF{5 NURSERIES,}3 OF WHICH ARE SMALL, SELLING GARDEN PLANTS, FLOWERS, XMAS TREES ETC;1 SPECIALISES IN SMALL PLANTS WITH A SIDE LINE OF CIDER MAKING AND THE LAST IS A HUGE MODERN GARDEN CENTRE WHICH DRAWS ITS CUSTOMERS FROM A{RADIUS OF 40 MILES. } THIS OFFERS EVERY POSSIBLE GARDENING FACILITY INCLUDING MACHINERY,BUILDING MATERIALS,HARDWARE,A CAFE AND A CHILDRENS PLAY AREA.THERE ARE ABOUT 60 ACRES OF{MANAGED WOODLAND}IN OUR BLOCK,MATURE TREES BEING CUT DOWN AND REPLACED WITH FIR AND HARDWOOD.
